Contact

Please email tutoringcenter@cs.usfca.edu to contact the CS Tutoring Center with any questions or comments.

Appointments

If none of the scheduled tutoring sessions work with your schedule or if you feel you need extra help, please feel free to email tutoringcenter@cs.usfca.edu and schedule an individual tutoring appointment. Please remember that our tutors are also students, so there may be limited availability before exams.

Social Media

The CS Tutoring Center occasionally posts announcements as @USFCS on Twitter. The Computer Science department at the University of San Francisco can also be found on several social media websites:

  • LinkedIn

    Checkout USF CS on LinkedIn! You can connect with professors, current students, and alumni.

  • Facebook

    Checkout USF CS on Facebook! See photos, announcements, and more.

  • Twitter

    Checkout USF CS on Twitter! Check out the following list to see who in the CS department is on Twitter.

Faculty Sponsor

The faculty sponsor meets weekly with the tutors, provides mentoring, and helps coordinate CS Tutoring Center services. The current faculty sponsor is Professor Sophie Engle. Please email sjengle@cs.usfca.edu to contact the faculty sponsor directly.
